dict.acceptation: 向…保证；使…确信；<英>给…保险；

sent.orig: Collaborates with sub-contractor staff to assure adequate measures are in place to assure product quality.
sent.trans: 与分销商的员工共同确定充足的后备措施确保产品品质。

sent.orig: The guiding principle 1996 is assure the overhaul, rectify and reform hidden trouble, assure quality.
sent.trans: 1996年的方针是保证检修，整改隐患，保证质量。

sent.orig: But I assure you we've not stealing anything-like another company secrets.
sent.trans: 但我可以向你保证，我们并不是盗窃，比方说，其他公司的秘密。

sent.orig: Many anti-jamming designs in and hardware, and software structural design assure system safety, reliability and maintainability.
sent.trans: 各种软硬件抗干扰的设计以及软件的结构化设计，为系统安全、可靠运行与维护提供了保障。

sent.orig: Responsible for the annual accounting auditing, assure its accomplishment.
sent.trans: 负责公司每年的会计师审计工作，确保其顺利的完成。
